name: Fake news: too little too late
description: Unbound Creations’ Headliner: NoviNews explores the impact of the media and fake news on society, something that is fast becoming one of the biggest concerns of our age.

end.title: Reddit bans r/thedonald for hate speech

constellations_other.name: Fake news: too little too late
constellations_other.description: Unbound Creations’ Headliner: NoviNews explores the impact of the media and fake news on society, something that is fast becoming one of the biggest concerns of our age.

links.description: Popular social media site Reddit banned their channel r/thedonald, one of the key channels supporting Trump and the alt-right movement. The subreddit was banned for promoting hate-speech. This foreshadowed Trump himself being banned from Twitter and Facebook in early 2021 for inciting violence.

end.title: The Social Dilemma
end.creator_credit: Jeff Orlowski, Larissa Rhodes, Argent Pictures, Exposure Labs, The Space Program, Adam Wheatley, Davis Coombe and Vickie Curtis

video_links.name: The Social Dilemma | Official Trailer | Netflix

end.brief_description: This documentary-drama hybrid explores the dangerous human impact of social networking, with tech experts sounding the alarm on their own creations.

constellations_other.name: Fake news: too little too late
constellations_other.description: Unbound Creations’ Headliner: NoviNews explores the impact of the media and fake news on society, something that is fast becoming one of the biggest concerns of our age.

links.description: The negative effect of social media on society and its platforming of misinformation was explored in Netflix’s documentary The Social Dilemma, which features former engineers and employees from the major social networks who now regret the impact of the products they helped develop.

start.title: The Social Dilemma
start.creator_credit: Jeff Orlowski, Larissa Rhodes, Argent Pictures, Exposure Labs, The Space Program, Adam Wheatley, Davis Coombe and Vickie Curtis

end.title: The Truman show
end.creator_credit: Peter Weir, Adam Schroeder, Andrew Niccol, Edward S. Feldman, Scott Rudin and Paramount Pictures
end.brief_description: Truman Burbank (Jim Carrey) is the star of a television experiment: he does not know that since birth his life has been the centre of a television show called The Truman Show.

constellations_other.name: Fake news: too little too late
constellations_other.description: Unbound Creations’ Headliner: NoviNews explores the impact of the media and fake news on society, something that is fast becoming one of the biggest concerns of our age.

links.description: The Truman Show rang the alarm on reality TV (despite it being in its infancy) and seemingly predicted our current society, defined by broadcasting ourselves and our constructed reality while living with constant digital surveillance.

start.creator_credit: Jeff Orlowski, Larissa Rhodes, Argent Pictures, Exposure Labs, The Space Program, Adam Wheatley, Davis Coombe and Vickie Curtis

video_links.name: The Social Dilemma | Official Trailer | Netflix

end.title: Trump, Republicans incite crowd before mob storms Capitol

constellations_other.name: Fake news: too little too late
constellations_other.description: Unbound Creations’ Headliner: NoviNews explores the impact of the media and fake news on society, something that is fast becoming one of the biggest concerns of our age.

links.description: Speeches like these from Donald Trump, before right-wing insurgents stormed the Capitol building in Washington DC, demonstrate the threat of wilfully dismissing the truth. Despite there being no evidence that Joe Biden wasn’t fairly elected, #stopthesteal swept across social media and inspired protests.

start.title: Trump, Republicans incite crowd before mob storms Capitol

constellations_other.name: Fake news: too little too late
constellations_other.description: Unbound Creations’ Headliner: NoviNews explores the impact of the media and fake news on society, something that is fast becoming one of the biggest concerns of our age.

end.title: Trump supporters minding the velvet ropes
end.material_description: Digital screen recording from C-Span's YouTube channel
end.brief_description: After years of consuming viral misinformation, pro-Trump insurgents stormed the US Capitol building in early 2021, pausing their vandalising and looting only to take selfies, as if part of a legitimate sightseeing tour. They even obeyed the velvet ropes, despite dismissing democracy.

constellations_other.name: Fake news: too little too late
constellations_other.description: Unbound Creations’ Headliner: NoviNews explores the impact of the media and fake news on society, something that is fast becoming one of the biggest concerns of our age.

links.description: After Donald Trump incited the mob to riot through the Capitol building, they did just that. Despite the criminal activity they were undertaking, they adhered to keeping within the velvet guide ropes (at least initially) as if they were on a legitimate tour of the building.

start.title: The Social Dilemma

end.title: The Cleaners
end.headline_credit: Brazil, Germany, Italy, Netherlands and United States of America, 2018
end.brief_description: A deep dive into the hidden industry of digital cleaning, which rids the Internet of unwanted violence, porn and political content.

constellations_primary.name: The perils of new technology
constellations_primary.description: Explores our fascination with, and our anxiety surrounding, new technology, which is something that can bring about significant cultural change but also danger.

constellations_other.name: Fake news: too little too late
constellations_other.description: Unbound Creations’ Headliner: NoviNews explores the impact of the media and fake news on society, something that is fast becoming one of the biggest concerns of our age.

links.description: The Cleaners took a look at the bad side of social media platforms through the experiences of moderators who are consistently bombarded with unfiltered content that users upload to social media platforms including racist, sexist, homophobic, alt-right and adult material.

start.title: Reddit bans r/thedonald for hate speech

constellations_other.name: Fake news: too little too late
constellations_other.description: Unbound Creations’ Headliner: NoviNews explores the impact of the media and fake news on society, something that is fast becoming one of the biggest concerns of our age.

end.title: Apple and Google stores suspend Parler app

constellations_other.name: Fake news: too little too late
constellations_other.description: Unbound Creations’ Headliner: NoviNews explores the impact of the media and fake news on society, something that is fast becoming one of the biggest concerns of our age.

links.description: After Trump was banned from Twitter and Facebook for inciting violence, many alt-right supporters (including white supremacist group The Proud Boys) began using an alternative app called Parler. Google and Apple suspended the app from their stores in early 2021 for also inciting violence.
